clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiologic and Clinical Characteristics of Optic Neuritis in China
clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiologic and Clinical Characteristics of Optic Neuritis in China

brief_summary.textblock: This will be a hospital-based retrospective multi-center study on epidemiologic and clinical characteristics of optic neuritis among Chinese. The investigation will cover about 29 provinces or municipalities all around China.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year from the attack to the final visit
primary_outcome.description: Last visual acuity records in the hospital

primary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year from the attack to the final visit
primary_outcome.description: Calculated annual relapse rate of different subgroups in the cohort

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year from the attack to the final visit
secondary_outcome.description: Gender, age of first attack, location

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year from the attack to the final visit
secondary_outcome.description: Visual acuity at nadir, pain, optic disc edema

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year from the attack to the final visit
secondary_outcome.description: RNFL, macular thickness and GCIPL at different time points

secondary_outcome.measure: Orbit or Brain MRI at the attack
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year from the attack to the final visit

arm_group.description: Aquaporin 4 antibody seropositive optic neuritis patients, Myelin oligodendrocyte glycoprotein antibody seropositive optic neuritis patients, and double antibodies seronegative optic neuritis patients

study_pop.textblock: Optic neuritis patients with complete medical records in multicenter from China.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Clinical diagnosis of optic neuritis
2. The patients' medical records were complete
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients with unclear diagnosis of optic neuritis
2. Incomplete medical records

overall_official.affiliation: Ophthalmology, the Chinese PLA General Hospital

patient_data.ipd_description: It is a multi center study of optic neuritis, the individual participant data belongs to every single center. Now, we are applying for the approval. However, the details will not be available until all the centers approved.
